app.name: Guardian Angel Live
app.tagline: Personal protection app with fall and inactivity detection
home.protection.title: Your Personal Protection
home.protection.description: Guardian Angel Live is designed to ensure your safety through three essential features:
home.protection.feature1: Fall Detection - Uses your device's gyroscope to identify sudden movements that may indicate a fall or accident
home.protection.feature2: Inactivity Monitoring - Detects when there's no interaction with your device for a defined period
home.protection.feature3: Automatic Alert - Sends your GPS position and alert information to your emergency contact
home.falldetection.title: Fall Detection
home.falldetection.description: Using the gyroscope, the app automatically detects sudden movements that may indicate a fall or accident.
home.inactivity.title: Inactivity Detection
home.inactivity.description: Guardian Angel monitors your device activity and triggers an alert if prolonged inactivity is detected.
home.emergency.title: Emergency Contact
home.emergency.description: Set up a contact who will automatically receive your alert information and GPS location.
home.how.title: How It Works
home.how.step1: Configure inactivity duration, fall detection, and emergency contact
home.how.step2: Guardian Angel discreetly monitors your device's activity and movements
home.how.step3: If a fall is detected or no activity is recorded during the defined period, an alert is sent
home.how.step4: Your contact receives the alert with your current GPS position
home.how.step5: You can configure pause hours (for example at night) when monitoring is disabled
home.donation.title: Support Our Mission
home.donation.description: Guardian Angel Live is a project developed with passion to ensure the safety of vulnerable people. Your support allows us to continue improving the app and keep it accessible to everyone.
